牛割き: (うしざき) - tying a person's limbs to two or four bulls and making them run in different directions (Warring States-era death penalty)
牛商人: (うしあきゅうど) - ox seller; ox vendor
牛宿: (いなみぼし) - {astron}  Chinese "Ox" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
牛小屋: (うしごや) - cow shed; cattle barn
牛尾魚: (コチ) - (牛尾魚 is gikun) flathead (esp. the bartailed flathead, Platycephalus indicus)
牛屋: (ぎゅうや) - cowshed; cow farmer; restaurant specializing in beef dishes; store (butcher, etc.) that sells beef
牛柄: (うしがら) - cow spot pattern (as on the hide of a cow); cow-skin pattern
牛歩: (ぎゅうほ) - snail's pace; slow progress
牛歩戦術: (ぎゅうほせんじゅつ) - (yoji) snail's pace tactics; walking slowly when voting in the Diet to delay proceedings
牛殺し: (うしころし) - Oriental photinia (species of shrub, Photinia villosa)
牛泥棒: (うしどろぼう) - rustler; cattle thief
牛海綿状脳症: (うしかいめんじょうのうしょう) - bovine spongiform encephalopathy; BSE; mad cow disease
牛海老: (ウシエビ) - giant tiger prawn (Penaeus monodon); black tiger prawn
牛盗人: (うしぬすっと) - rustler; cattle thief
牛糞: (ぎゅうふん) - cattle manure; cow dung; cowpat; bullshit
牛耳: (ぎゅうじ) - ears of an ox
牛耳る: (ぎゅうじる) - to control; to take the lead in; to have under one's thumb
牛耳を執る: (ぎゅうじをとる) - to take the lead in; to control; to be the leader
牛肉屋: (ぎゅうにくや) - butcher specializing in beef/dealer in beef; beef-hotpot restaurant
牛脂注入肉: (ぎゅうしちゅうにゅうにく) - processed meat injected with a beef tallow mixture
牛脂脂肪酸: (ぎゅうししぼうさん) - tallow acid; tallowate
牛膝: (いのこずち) - Japanese chaff flower (Achyranthes japonica)
牛舌魚: (うしのした) - cow's tongue; sole (any flatfish of suborder Soleoidei, esp. the tonguefishes of family Cynoglossidae or true soles of family Soleidae)
牛舎: (ぎゅうしゃ) - cow shed; cattle barn
牛蒡抜き: (ごぼうぬき) - pulling something out (in a stroke)/plucking out; overtaking (in a spurt)/pulling ahead
牛蒡薊: (ゴボウアザミ) - Cirsium dipsacolepis (perennial plant of the thistle family)
牛虻: (ウシアブ) - Tabanus trigonus (species of horsefly)
牛蠅: (ウシバエ) - ox warble fly (Hypoderma bovis)
牛裂き: (うしざき) - tying a person's limbs to two or four bulls and making them run in different directions (Warring States-era death penalty)
牛負けた: (うしまけた) - (joc) (pun on 馬勝った, which is ateji for うまかった)  that was delicious
牛車: (うしぐるま) - ox carriage (for Heian era nobles); oxcart
牛鍋: (ぎゅうなべ) - thin slices of beef, cooked with various vegetables in a table-top cast-iron pan; sukiyaki
牛頭天王: (ごずてんのう) - Gozu Tenno (deity said to be the Indian god Gavagriva)
牛頭馬頭: (ごずめず) - (yoji) horse-headed and ox-headed demons in the Buddhist hell
牛飯: (ぎゅうめし) - rice covered with beef and vegetables
牛飲馬食: (ぎゅういんばしょく) - (yoji) heavy eating and drinking; gorging and swilling; drinking like a cow and eating like a horse
牛鬼蛇神: (ぎゅうきだしん) - (yoji) wicked and perverse; weird and incoherent
牟子: (ぼうし) - cap worn by masked dancer (cap covers hair and nape and reaches to the shoulders)
牟尼: (むに) - muni (Indian ascetic or sage); Buddha
牡丹: (botan) - tree peony (Paeonia arborea), moutan; wild boar (meat)
牡丹杏: (ぼたんきょう) - variety of Japanese plum
牡丹桜: (ぼたんざくら) - any oriental variety of cherry tree descended from the Oshima cherry
牡丹鍋: (ぼたんなべ) - boar meat hot pot; boar stew
牡丹防風: (ボタンボウフウ) - Peucedanum japonicum (species of umbellifer with edible leaves)
牡丹鸚哥: (ぼたんいんこ) - lovebird (esp. Lilian's lovebird, Agapornis lilianae)
牡蠣フライ: (カキフライ) - fried oysters; deep-fried oysters
牡蠣飯: (かきめし) - rice cooked together with oyster meat, etc.
